about_the_game:
Quirk! Origins: A Jester's Tale is an interactive visual novel telling the story of a lonely, envious Jester. Separated from his twin sister at an impressionable age, when the royals chose her as their only source of entertainment. For years, the castles roared with laughter until one day, his sister mysteriously vanished.

Could this be Jester's chance to perform for the King's and Queen's of Playcardia.

Playcardia, a world set within the universe of a traditional set of playing cards; featuring the four kingdoms of Spades, Diamonds, Hearts and Clubs.



Rummage through the castles to find parts for each prank and unleash them on unsuspecting audience members to get a rise out of the Royal. Only then can you perform for them.



Follow the Jester's story in the hope to find victory and realise his life-long desires to become a Court Jester, and prove he is better than his sister.



The story is told on playing cards and interactable objects with a comic book style theme.

Quirk! Origins: A Jester's Tale is a prologue to a bigger story set within the Quirk! world, based on the popular family card game "Quirk!". The Jester is a new character in the Quirk! world and this is his origin story.

name: Quirk! Origins: A Jester's Tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.8GHz CPU Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2.8GHz CPU Quad Core
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Enter the world of Playcardia. A short visual novel based on a Jester, who is keen to unleash havoc in the name of entertainment. Just don't upset the royals! Find items, discover pranks and play them on unsuspecting victims... Who knows what will happen next?
